name: CCTV Video Clip
summary: A 60D file is a video file that stores surveillance footage recorded by various closed-circuit television (CCTV) systems, most prominently, GE Security Digital Video Multiplexer Recorders (DVMR). It contains one or more video clips, combining video feeds from multiple cameras in a proprietary format developed by GE Security.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
